messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2254.........hell
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/16/2002 1:15:40 PM Central Daylight Time, ... How about some pepsi? I am still waiting for a actual person to have been there to really
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/16/2002 1:15:40 PM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


>
> > Now I have no
> > reason to fear hell.
>
> My church tells me I'm not going to hell, and my school-at-home colleagues
> are sure that I am. I figure I win either way, since I've met some pretty
> facinating people here (and elsewhere) that will surely be there, too, if
> the doomsayers are right. Should be a very nice party. (So long as
> there's
> no dr. pepper...I agree, Mary!)
>
> brenda

How about some pepsi?

I am still waiting for a actual person to have been there to really tell the
story........

Kim
